issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
Hello.

Im trying to get the Windows SDK working.

I have done a *full* install of both Visual Studio 2013 and 2015 - All optional plugins selected (for testing purposes) and I have done a seperate standalone install of Windows 8.1 SDK.

Still - Appcelerator Studio can not find the SDK.

I have tried to point the directory to all immaginale locations containing the SDK's, but it wont accept it.
fields.environment: 64bit Windows 7 - Appcelerator Studio 5.5.0 (Cant choose correct version from list?)

comments.body: Make sure you followed everything in here: http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Installing_the_Windows_Phone_SDK. Thanks.
